SEARCH
Package org.example.utility

Class JsonUtil

java.lang.Object
org.example.utility.JsonUtil
public class JsonUtil extends Object
Utility class for reading and writing JSON data related to users and courses. This includes operations for saving user data to JSON files, reading course recommendations, and managing user information.

  • Constructor Details

    • JsonUtil

      public JsonUtil()

  • Method Details

    • saveUsersToJson

      public static void saveUsersToJson(List<User> users)
      Saves a list of users to a JSON file with encoded passwords. This method encodes the passwords before saving the users to ensure they are securely stored.
      Parameters:
      users - the list of users to be saved

    • saveUsersToJsonPassword

      public static void saveUsersToJsonPassword(List<User> users)
      Saves a list of users to a JSON file without encoding passwords. This method saves the user data without making changes to the passwords.
      Parameters:
      users - the list of users to be saved

    • readRecommendedCoursesToMatrix

      public static String[][] readRecommendedCoursesToMatrix(String username)
      Reads the recommended courses for a given user and returns them as a 2D array. This method reads a JSON file containing course recommendations and converts the data into a 2D string array. It also handles exceptions for specific courses that have commas in their names.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user whose recommended courses are being read
      Returns:
      a 2D array where each row represents a grade and its associated courses

    • readJsonFromFile

      private static org.json.JSONArray readJsonFromFile(String username) throws IOException
      Reads JSON data from a file containing the recommended courses for a user. This method reads the content of the file into a JSON array.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user whose recommended courses are being read
      Returns:
      a JSON array containing the user's recommended courses
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error reading the file

    • readUsersFromJson

      public static List<User> readUsersFromJson()
      Reads a list of users from a JSON file and returns it as a list. This method reads the users from the file and converts the data into a list of User objects.
      Returns:
      a list of users read from the JSON file
